name: WoW Killer MMORPG
description:
Welcome to WoW Killer is a MMORPG game project with the intent to apply interesting ideas to mmorpg genre.

Why make this game?

I'm making this game has a hobby also to learn not just code also game design, mmorpg are one of the most difficult games to make, so I'm learning a lot from this

have you created everything?

No, I been using visual unity assets and saving a lot of time, I'm just focus on code, client and server structure and netcode is a lot of work and the biggest challenge in a mmorpg game.

The development of this game is streamed twitch: 
https://www.twitch.tv/agerarg

The ideas we follow for this game are:

  • Not endless farming mobs (single player style), you get exp and gold by killing other players and participate in events.
  • Clan oriented, like clan vs clan matches and level up clan by killing bosses, clan hideout.
  • PvP must be super simple and clear to everyone understand what is happening and react.
  • Lvl 1 character has a chance to kill a lvl 100 char. 

Target: 

  • PC
  • Android Devices

Controls:

Move your character with WASD

Keys Y, U, I give you an elemental shield to protect you 

Keys H, J, K cast an elemental skill on other player  or npc.
